before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"ddmfj","text":"Required PPE: All work must be done wearing appropriate PPE including lab coat and gloves. Any work with TRIzol/QIAzol should be carried out inside of a fume hood. Clean pipettes and lab bench area with 70% ethanol, followed by RNase decontamination solution, such as RNaseZap, prior to carrying out RNA extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pd7v","text":"In this protocol, we describe how to extract RNA from dorsal root ganglia sourced from human organ donors, and subsequently perform long read sequencing with PacBio IsoSeq. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"8l4ue","text":"All human tissue recovery, research and data handling is performed in accordance with the University of Texas at Dallas Institutional Review Board (IRB) regulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6l3du","text":"RNaseZap RNase Decontamination Solution - Invitrogen, Catalog #:AM9780","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bsn5","text":"RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit - Qiagen, Catalog #:73404","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fd2aa","text":"Precellys Tissue Homogenizing Mixed Beads Kit - Cayman Chemical Company, Catalog #10409","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o2ap","text":"PacBio Iso-Seq Express SMRTbell Library Template Preparation Kit 2.0: PacBio, Catalog #: 100-938-900","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jia","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Harvesting and storing human dorsal root ganglia
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"sola","text":"Lumbar dorsal root ganglia (DRGs) are recovered from human organ donors with no known history of chronic pain, through a collaboration with the Southwest Transplant Alliance. DRGs are recovered within 4 hours of cross-clamp and immediately frozen in powdered dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Harvesting and storing human dorsal root ganglia
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"88sgd","text":"Human DRG (hDRGs) are stored in a -80C freezer until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqpqi","text":"\u003c50mg hDRG tissue is isolated and submerged in 1ml QIAzol from RNeasy Plus Universal Mini kit. The sample is homogenized using Precellys Tissue Homogenizing Mixed Beads Kit and 1min shake in the Bertin Technologies Minilys, until no visible pieces appear. Pipette lysate into new tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"180rs","text":"The sample is kept on ice between each step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7822m","text":"RNA extraction is performed with reagents from the RNeasy Plus Universal Mini kit from Qiagen including RNeasy mini spin-columns:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ds4g","text":"100ul gDNA eliminator is added, followed by rigorous shaking for 15 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66bn2","text":"180ul chloroform is added, followed by rigorous shaking for 15 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ks35","text":"2-3minute incubation at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3an5j","text":"Centrifuge samples at 12,000g for 15 minutes at 4C using a Bio-Rad Model 16K Microcentrifuge ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"o14r","text":"Transfer lysate to new tube and add 500ul 70% EtOH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djto3","text":"Add 700ul sample at a time to RNeasy mini spin-column placed in 2ml collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euc7p","text":"15 second centrifuge at full-speed (16,000g) until all lysate has been passed through spin-column and flow-through is discarded","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7uer8","text":"Add 700ul Buffer RWT to spin-column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lh1m","text":"Centrifuge for 15 seconds at full-speed and discard flow-through from collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b3bn2","text":"Add 500ul RPE to spin-column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nbgg","text":"Centrifuge for 15 seconds at full-speed and discard flow-through from collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fm3pc","text":"Repeat step 4.10-4.11 two times but centrifuge for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1572f","text":"Place spin-column in new collection tube and centrifuge for 1 minute at full-speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csscb","text":"Place spin-column in new Eppendorf for RNA storage (1.5ml tube with cap) for final storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"efa0g","text":"Add 20-30ul RNAse free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9hlqj","text":"Centrifuge for 1 minute at full-speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"24ciq","text":"Repeat step 4.15-4.16 with the same elution water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fn9ac","text":"Measure RNA quantity/quality with Qubit 3.0 Fluorometer and confirm with Agilent 5200 Fragment analyzer system ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library preparation and long read RNA sequencing
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"76hma","text":"The library is created using the PacBio Iso-Seq Express SMRTbell Library Template Preparation Kit 2.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library preparation and long read RNA sequencing
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"17dfo","text":"Circular consensus sequencing (CCS) is carried out using the Sequel II equipment for 3plex on 1 SMRT Cell 8M","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8b3rj","text":"Raw sequencing data is processed through the PacBio recommended Iso-Seq pipeline which\ncarries out the following steps:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"551lv","text":"Use lima to remove cDNA primers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3ku6","text":"Use isoseq refine to polyA tail and artificial concatemers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ev43f","text":"Use isoseq cluster2 to carry out de novo isoform-level clustering scalable to large number of reads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ajfad","text":"Use pbmm2 to align reads to the reference genome (GRCh38)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9m43m","text":"Use isoseq collapse to collapse redundant transcripts based on exonic structures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Processing of long read RNA sequencing data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"30p8m","text":"A GFF file is obtained which contains information for each sequence identified in the pooled samples as well as csv abundance files with information for each transcript in each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bne1","text":"RNA is stored in -80C freezer until shipment to core facility at UC Davis. Samples are shipped on dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol for long read sequencing of dorsal root ganglia from human organ donors
title_html: Protocol for long read sequencing of dorsal root ganglia from human organ donors
